item.title: Alyce add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Alyce add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "One friend with whom you have a lot in common is better than three with whom you struggle to find things to talk about." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Teenage girls, please don’t worry about being super popular in high school, or being the best actress in high school, or the best athlete. Not only do people not care about any of that the second you graduate, but when you get older, if you reference your successes in high school too much, it actually makes you look kind of pitiful, like some babbling old Tennessee Williams character with nothing else going on in her current life. What I’ve noticed is that almost no one who was a big star in high school is also big star later in life. For us overlooked kids, it’s so wonderfully fair." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "In my mind, the sexiest thing in the world is the feeling that you’re wanted." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Later, when you're grown up, you realize you never really get to hang out with your family. You pretty much have only eighteen years to spend with them full time, and that's it." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "I don't want to hear about the endless struggles to keep sex exciting, or the work it takes to plan a date night. I want to hear that you guys watch every episode of The Bachelorette together in secret shame, or that one got the other hooked on Breaking Bad and if either watches it without the other, they're dead meat. I want to see you guys high-five each other like teammates on a recreational softball team you both do for fun." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "We never needed best friend gear because I guess with real friends you don't have to make it official. It just is." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Nothing gives you confidence like being a member of a small, weirdly specific, hard-to-find demographic." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Another old saying is that revenge is a dish best served cold. But it feels best served piping hot, straight out of the oven of outrage. My opinion? Take care of revenge right away." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "This book will take you two days to read. Did you even see the cover? It’s mostly pink. If you’re reading this book every night for months, something is not right." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "As my mom has said, when one person is unhappy, it usually means two people are unhappy but that one has not come to terms with it yet." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "The chorus of “Jack and Diane” is: Oh yeah, life goes on, long after the thrill of living is gone. Are you kidding me? The thrill of living was high school? Come on, Mr. Cougar Mellencamp. Get a life." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "The Internet also makes it extraordinarily difficult for me to focus. One small break to look up exactly how almond milk is made, and four hours later I'm reading about the Donner Party and texting all my friends: DID YOU GUYS KNOW ABOUT THE DONNER PARTY AND HOW MESSED UP THAT WAS? TEXT ME BACK SO WE CAN TALK ABOUT IT!" -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "I just want ambitious teenagers to know it is totally fine to be quite, observant kids. Besides being a delight to your parents, you will find you have plenty of time later to catch up." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Alyce add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "If someone called me chubby, it would no longer be something that kept me up late at night. Being called fat is not like being called stupid or unfunny, which is the worst thing you could ever say to me. Do I envy Jennifer Hudson for being able to lose all that weight and look smokin’ hot? Of course, yes. Do I sometimes look at Gisele Bundchen and wonder how awesome life would be if I never had to wear Spanx? Duh, of course. That’s kind of the point of Gisele Bundchen. And maybe I will, once or twice, for a very short period of time. But on the list of things I want to do in my lifetime, that’s not near the top. I mean, it’s not near the bottom either. I’d say it’s right above “Learn to drive a vespa,” but several notches below “film a chase scene for a movie." -- Mindy Kaling
